title: Post a warning about windows 10 not working!
body: How hard is it for RIOT to just post an advisory notice in game? How many unknown AFKs need to happen? I thnk RIOT want you to lose at this point; lose you placements, lose your elo, then lose your mind when they make you agree to not going AFK again because of them not informing you. 5.5 has been up for hours already and you guys wont post a simple message in the client. Remember when riot cared, peppridge farm remembers.

replies.body: PROTIP: Programs are not guaranteed to work on *unsupported operating systems*.  It's not just LoL on Windows 10, it's *any* program being used on *any* operating system for which it was not explicitly designed.
Windows 10 isn't even officially out. Technical PREVIEWS are there for sneak peaks.
Had literally not even heard of Windows 10 until this thread.

If you are stupid enough to not know that an experimental operating system could affect the reliability of your online gaming, then... continue to blame someone other than yourself.

Edit: downvoted by Millenials

In a few months this OS will be released and free for almost everyone. At its very launch, it will be almost exactly like it is right now. How will Riot handle this? Will they say "We don't technically support Windows 10"?

> [{quoted}](name=Nato Boram,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qn9qjNqd,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-13T11:45:37.365+0000)
>
> In a few months this OS will be released and free for almost everyone. At its very launch, it will be almost exactly like it is right now. How will Riot handle this? Will they say "We don't technically support Windows 10"?

They most likely have long been in the process of investigating any changes necessary to consider it fully supported.  Until the OS is released, there is no reason to officially support it, since any prerelease version can still be altered significantly.  Riot has no control over Microsoft.

No, but they have control over themselves. The client never had any incompatibility issues with Windows 10 until this patch, which means there is not much difference between Windows 8 and Windows 10. Oh, and they "don't technically support Windows 8" officially. And soon, Microsoft won't even support Windows 7, which is apparently the only thing supported by Riot. Something is wrong here, I think they should put some efforts on supporting a already-finished-but-not-published OS.

> [{quoted}](name=Nato Boram,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qn9qjNqd,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-13T11:56:01.607+0000)
>
> No, but they have control over themselves. The client never had any incompatibility issues with Windows 10 until this patch, which means there is not much difference between Windows 8 and Windows 10. Oh, and they "don't technically support Windows 8" officially. And soon, Microsoft won't even support Windows 7, which is apparently the only thing supported by Riot. Something is wrong here, I think they should put some efforts on supporting a already-finished-but-not-published OS.

Reread what I said.

> [{quoted}](name=Ice Weasel X,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qn9qjNqd,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-03-13T11:48:39.672+0000)
>
> **They most likely have long been in the process of investigating any changes necessary to consider it fully supported.  Until the OS is released, there is no reason to officially support it, since any prerelease version can still be altered significantly.**  Riot has no control over Microsoft.

What that means is that they are probably *already* pursuing support.  They just will not make it official because that makes them liable.

Until an OS is officially supported, a developer is under no obligation to ensure that its products work smoothly on that operating system.

They promised that it will work perfectly on windows10 when it officially released. But i think the problem is Riot should at least inform players. After all, all stuffs worked perfect on patch 5.4. People feel it like being cheated when they get into game and got tones on crashes and riot says totally nothing in his website and after reading complaining of others player in forum and finally find "Oh patch 5.5 not work on windows 10" . Can you understand what i am talking about? People upset not because of it is not working on a unofficial OS, is because of the bad feeling from riot. Riot always says they want to do their best to improve  gaming experiences, but in this case, they destroying gaming experiences by themselves.

And uses "DON'T PLAY THIS GAME" to face customers' complaining, this retarded behavior is needless to say.

>WINDOWS 10 

That's your warning that any and every piece of software you are using could break with any update. That update could be a Microsoft update or an update from the software manufacturer.

What you're asking for is for every software company to permanently leave up a warning that says "We don't officially support Windows 10. It could break with any update. Use at your own risk."... but that's exactly what you were already expecting.

I really fail to see how this is Riot's fault. 

Yes, Windows 10 users should give feedback "This update broke League, please fix before Windows 10 releases", but they should then switch over to their normal computer and keep playing. 

As Microsoft told you when downloading Windows 10:

>Remember, trying out an early build like this can be risky. That's why we recommend that you don't install the preview on your primary home or business PC. Unexpected PC crashes could damage or even delete your files, so you should back up everything.

Yap that is the point which riot never know. They know this problem since in PBE, riot don't want to fix it for TP that's fine, because it is not a official version. We know it, and no one will angry about it not working on preview version operation system. But the problem is: riot know that not work and DON'T BREAST ANY F*CKING WORDS. And after 15 hours from the patching, finally had riot said about something, however talked as if windows 10 players are none of their business. And saying like the bugs happened because of the recently core changes in Windows 10. BUT THERE ARE NO CHANGES OF WINDOWS 10 DURING 2 LOL PATCHES. In the same environment 2 patches work so different. If it is not riot has rewrite the whole lol program, i can't find second possibility. 

  The problem is not what has happened, the problem is how they face and solve these problems. A litter triangle on launcher noticing players "Windows 10 not working on patch 5.5" is really that hard for riot?

Yesterday after my complaining with riot, i finally got answers: "How about you don't play the game if you don't like the software policy? No one forces you."(these are exact what riot's worker said, i copied and pasted it)

DON'T PLAY THIS GAME, said RIOT.

There's what? Maybe 5% of people who use windows 10? WINDOWS 10 IS EXPERIMENTAL WHY MAKE SUPPORT FOR IT WHEN 95% OF THE COMMUNITY USES OTHER OPERATING SYSTEMS? 

RiotAether on the Reddit forum: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2yshlb/windows_10_preview_users_patch_55/

> Hey everyone, thanks for the Windows 10 crash reports. As a lot of you have pointed out, we don't support Windows 10 yet so your mileage may vary as we work toward full compatibility. That said, MMACheerpuppy hit the nail on the head - we still want to do what we can to help those of you who've opted into the preview.

> Speaking concretely, we're currently looking into a few leads from the log information that's been provided (animation and/or sound files appear to be the culprit at this point). No promises on timeline but we're hoping to get something out before the next patch.

Living in NA maybe just make you broken by capitalism. Even there are only 1 % using windows 10 and so what? They are not players? They are not humankind?  Even in game you still want to sort ppl in to priority and inferiority?

If you could meet an idiot using windows 10 and has to afk because of it keeps crashing. When you ask this idiot why you troll me with windows 10 and he answered," Riot not telling us, i thought it works because last patch works". If you were demoted or losed your Bo because of this idiot. What would you think?
I don't understand your level of typing, I literally lose IQ reading it.

I'm quoting the OP here:

"Post a warning about windows 10 not working!"

Whether they're looking at the problem isn't what the OP is requesting he's asking for Riot to let people know there is a problem. This would benefit everybody, including yourself.

RTFOP.

Agree with u.
So many people just infinitely looping "why do u used windows 10 since it is a unstable OS" even Riot and his works themselves are thinking "People blaming us is because of our not supporting windows 10 and these are TOTALLY NOT OUR FAULT"

Yap, right. It is not the duty of riot that supporting a Preview OS

But people, hey listen, face the fact and the problem that Riot SAY NOT EVEN A WORD ABOUT THESE FATALS ON LAUNCHER OR BEFORE GAME, EVEN NOT INGAME! Riot finally post a comment about this bug but it had been at least 13 hours after the update. And it is needless to say that this problem had occurred since 5.5 was in PBE status. 

What had Riot actually done in these 13 hours? Nothing. If he had say something, at least a little notice on launcher then there would have been totally no problem!

So many ppl get ingame and finally find that windows 10 totally not working and hava no choice but to afk. 

THE TRUTH IS RIOT DON'T GIVE IT A SHIT OF INGAME EXPERIENCES. See! Riot has even time for copy- and pasting the totally same thing everywhere but no time creating a little button on launcher warning windows  10 users don't get ingame.

Oh btw, i had also literally not even heard of Riot has forums until this bug. -.-

I'm on the Tech Preview for Windows 10 also and have good news for you friend, the uninstall location is still in the same place as in Windows 7 and above, if you need help uninstalling League let me know since you are so firm in your desire to post four times in this thread about how bad Riot is, you obviously do not want to continue playing their game.

Should they post a notice about the game not working for Windows 95? What about Ubuntu users using Wine? Mac OS 9?

There's a point at which you're responsible for your own computer, and you really shouldn't expect companies to go out of their way to tell you that your non-standard setup might not work.

Microsoft told you to keep your primary computer on a supported OS when you downloaded Windows 10 for moments like this. Go back to that computer and play League. It takes you two normal games and a custom game to find out that the problem is your end.

Hey guys! 

Just wanted to jump in and let you know there's a post about this issue [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/4ujLhG3A-windows-10-technical-preview-crashes) with a bit more info regarding the issue!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qn9qjNqd,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-13T17:38:14.530+0000)
>
> Hey guys! 
> 
> Just wanted to jump in and let you know there's a post about this issue [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/4ujLhG3A-windows-10-technical-preview-crashes) with a bit more info regarding the issue!

the thing is not everyone checks forums right after a patch for bugs. personally i got lucky because i found out by trying to spectate and that would just crash. we know you guys have the power to post the little red notices in the client warning people but you didnt. thats why were upset. i know windows 10 is still in pre release so i can have bugs im not angry about that at all. and its our fault for using windows 10, but what about all the people not using it getting matched with unknowing windows 10 users? that has to be a slice worthy of an in game notification.
Complains Riot doesn't post a notice. Riot posts a notice. Complains its not the way he wanted to be told...

If I had to make a guess, I'd guess there are more players playing on Linux than on Windows 10 right now. Riot doesn't put out a notice when those setups are effected, why should Windows 10 be any different?
Well windows 10 is gonna be free for everyone so i guess thats gonna make riot prioritize it now

Remember before the chinese bought riot? 

 peppridge farm remembers.
